definition: to respect Gods and demons from a distance (idiom); to remain at a respectful distance
pinyin: jing4 gui3 shen2 er2 yuan3 zhi1

definition: ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)

sentences.english: King of spirits, and well, it was such a smart approach.
sentences.chinese: 敬鬼神而遠之，這是多麼有智能的做法。
